title: English Christian Skit | "The Stakeout" | Who Has Forced Christians to Leave Home and Live in Exile?

json.text: Did your mom and dad buy you new clothing?
Look! This is the clothing my parents gave me.
Her parents don't want her, she's a street urchin.
That's ridiculous! I'm not a street urchin! I'm not!
where have my mom and dad gone?
Are they going to come back this year?
The police are looking everywhere for your parents
because of their beliefs and faith.
So then, we should pray for them, okay?
why do they wanna arrest believers like us?
The CCP hates God more than anything,
so they also hate us believers
They dispatch a lot of people to track us, to watch us,
so they can arrest whoever believes in God.
Lingling, you need to be careful out there.
Do not talk openly about our faith. (Mm.)
at school, the teachers are always asking us if we have believers in our families,
and they said to tell them if my parents ever end up coming back.
Lingling, your teacher is being used by the CCP.
They wanna know where your parents are to arrest them.
Come, why don't you help me with dinner?
I'll make something really good for you.
What's wrong with your coat? Are you cold?
Oh, it's dark, I couldn't see.
Why are we here in the middle of the night?
We're watching Xu Huilin's house, they believe in God.
That's what Chief Ma said to do.
I heard someone who murdered people and escaped,
and the police didn't try hard to catch him.
Why would the Party care so much about getting believers in God?
The Party hates believers above everything,
so if they insist on believing,
don't they have to be arrested?
The Party is the boss of China,
they can arrest whoever they want.
Oh, so they're just like you.
anyone who doesn't listen to you won't have an easy time!
You know, they say it's called "egotistical."
Hey, do you think those two are coming back today?
Doesn't matter. We have to keep watch!
On the holidays you particularly think of â€¦
I can't believe they won't come back.
I heard that Chief Ma has been after them for two years without getting them.
would we have this kind of opportunity?
The central government has issued a confidential document
to strengthen the suppression of religions,
particularly The Church of Almighty God.
We're on a stakeout for believers,
So, are we government employees now?
The Party is backing us, that's strong support!
This is going to be our lucky break, my friend!
that Xu Huilin and her husband
are core members of The Church of Almighty God.
we'd get a lot more money than from our midnight cattle rustling!
Right? How much would it be?
Oh my gosh, then if weâ€”
Lingling, I'm going to dump the water.
Lingling, go on in, it's cold. (Mm.)
I'm just afraid we'll be caught.
I got a mouthful of water and it's all â€¦
I told you to take off your jacket!
Ah, my waiting has finally paid off!
No, I'll wait a little longer.
I have some things to take care of,
and I wanted to see you two.
have you been okay these last two years?
Fine, I've had God's care and protection.
and she does really well in school.
Now, she's learning to sing and to praise God.
Mama, Grandma and I are fine.
Our aunts and uncles who are believers come to see us all the time.
I really miss you and Daddy.
When are we going to be able to spend New Year's together as a family?
but the CCP ripped us apart.
It's a sign of these troubling times!
Thinking of you two running from place to place,
I just really feel honestly so terrible.
I'm always worried about you being tracked and arrested by the police.
But then I read God's words, saying:
Almighty God's words give me confidence and strength.
God created everything and rules everything.
Satan is nothing but a tool in His hands,
Just think, we've followed God all these years,
Police come to the house every 2 or 3 days to arrest you.
They search the house or just intimidate us.
I wouldn't have made it this far.
Absolutely, everything is in God's hands!
I'm not worried for you two anymore.
facing the CCP's mad arrests and persecution,
But I know that Christians in China,
we all have to suffer this.
God is using the great red dragon as a foil in the last days
to do service to perfect His chosen people.
has let us see the great red dragon's dark evil.
It is a demon directly opposed to God.
Through its role as a foil we are able to see
that God is righteous, and that God is holy,
that He is the light, and that He is good.
Even more, we can experience His love and salvation for mankind.
The more we experience God's work this way,
the more we hate the great red dragon,
the more we long for the truth and the light,
Our suffering has meaning and value.
I just hope you two can do your duty where you are. (Okay.)
We will continue to experience God's work and do our duty at home.
Please don't worry about us, okay?
Thanks, Mom, then I won't worry.
you were born into a Christian family,
and you've experienced some pain and persecution.
This is not a bad thing. It is God training us.
Read more of God's words and learn to seek the truth,
You'll understand some things when you're older. OK?
Mom, when I think of you and Daddy,
I pray to God with Grandma and read God's words aloud with her,
and then I feel much better.
Very good. (And I also learned a dance.)
Mama, I would like to show you.
Yes! It still counts as one down.
There's a problem. Zheng Shaode has reported you to the police.
I still have so much I wanna tell you!
you have to listen to your grandma.
Huilin, go now, or it will be too late!
Take this money for an emergency.
Mom, I don't need it. You should keep it.
Zhiyong gave me this letter for you, take it.
You guys, keep watch around the back!
I knew she'd come for the New Year.
She can't escape my grasp this time!
Yes, Chief. Just wait this time, she can't run!
We came just to call on you.
As the police, we serve the people.
We must be thorough after all.
I saw her come back with my own eyes!
You're always watching and tracking her.
If you don't know, how should I?
She gave you this money, right?
This is evidence of you harboring criminals.
This money is now government property. (Right!)
If your son and his wife don't come back,
your granddaughter will be kicked out of school!
You still want her to go to school?
What right do you have to kick her out of school?
You believe in God, not the Party.
taking a little money is nothing.
Your house could be sealed up, your land confiscated,
and you could go to jail.
We can do whatever we want with Christians until we can beat them to death!
This is what the government allows!
If we didn't want to entice your son and his wife back here,
you think, do you actually think you could just stay here in peace?
I really thank you for allowing me to stay here in peace!
Chief Ma, we couldn't find her.
This necklace needs to be kept by the state!
You can't! (Give it back to me!)
and it was you who called us here.
So tell us, what should we do?
It's my fault, I had you come for nothing.
I'll take you out for drinks another day.
See, it's the middle of the night,
I've been freezing and hungry, that reward â€¦
You can't even do a stakeout.
What are you thinking? You want a reward?
You must be dreaming, you idiot!
It's the New Year, and I wanted a wad of cash.
I didn't expect to come out completely empty-handed,
and now I have to buy them drinks.
What's going on? Do you have the money in hand?
Hey, this time it didn't work out, but we can try again!
can we read my dad's letter now? (Sure. Okay, okay.)
I'm doing fine out here, don't worry.
The CCP is ramping up its arrests of Christians,
so I can't go home to look after you.
I have no way to take care of you.
But I know you have God's care and protection,
and the help and support of brothers and sisters.
We can make it through all difficulties.
Although, we are apart in the flesh and have suffered greatly,
we are together in the tribulation, the kingdom, and the patience of Christ.
We were born into such an evil world, such an evil country,
but we have received God's love and salvation.
This is so precious for us!
I often rejoice that our family can follow God and accept His salvation.
God's gospel of the kingdom is now growing overseas.
More and more people are seeking and accepting His appearance and work.
Brothers and sisters are more and more mature in their lives,
and the experiences and testimonies of God's chosen people
God has already gained a group of people,
and His work of the last days will be finished.
Disasters in the great red dragon's country are growing,
and God's words are being fulfilled.
Mom, after the great red dragon collapses,
May we all pursue the truth and obey God!
